mapper.update: update mv set mvname = #{mvname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mlocation = #{mlocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mimg = #{mimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mvreserve = #{mvreserve,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mvid = #{mvid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mvid, mvname, mlocation, mimg, sid, mvreserve from mv
